data.lyric:
[ti:Treacherous (Taylor’s Version)]
[ar:Taylor Swift]
[al:Red (Taylor's Version)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Treacherous (Taylor’s Version) - Taylor Swift (泰勒·斯威夫特)
[00:06.07]Lyrics by：Dan Wilson/Taylor Swift
[00:12.14]Composed by：Dan Wilson/Taylor Swift
[00:18.21]Put your lips close to mine
[00:21.70]As long as they don't touch
[00:25.55]
[00:26.89]Out of focus eye to eye
[00:30.15]'Til the gravity's too much
[00:34.26]
[00:35.36]And I'll do anything you say
[00:38.89]If you say it with your hands
[00:42.65]
[00:44.09]And I'd be smart to walk away
[00:47.44]But you're quicksand
[00:50.16]
[00:53.09]This slope is treacherous
[00:57.49]This path is reckless
[01:01.81]This slope is treacherous
[01:06.01]And I-I-I like it
[01:10.43]
[01:14.64]I can't decide if it's a choice
[01:18.74]Getting swept away
[01:22.39]
[01:23.42]I hear the sound of my own voice
[01:27.49]Asking you to stay
[01:31.12]
[01:32.36]All we are is skin and bone
[01:36.05]Trained to get along
[01:39.43]
[01:40.77]Forever going with the flow
[01:44.10]But you're friction
[01:46.79]
[01:49.80]This slope is treacherous
[01:54.14]This path is reckless
[01:58.58]This slope is treacherous
[02:02.92]I I I like it
[02:07.25]Two headlights shine through the sleepless night
[02:11.37]And I will get you a get you alone
[02:16.05]Your name has echoed through my mind
[02:20.22]And I just think you should think you should know
[02:24.69]That nothing safe is worth the drive
[02:28.83]And I would follow you follow you home
[02:34.82]I'll follow you follow you home
[02:38.85]
[02:42.13]This hope is treacherous
[02:46.57]This daydream is dangerous
[02:50.89]This hope is treacherous
[02:55.26]I-I-I I-I-I I-I-I
[03:01.76]Two headlights shine through the sleepless night
[03:05.99]And I will get you a get you alone
[03:10.55]Your name has echoed through my mind
[03:14.66]And I just think you should think you should know
[03:19.26]That nothing safe is worth the drive
[03:23.41]And I will follow you follow you home
[03:29.49]I'll follow you follow you home
[03:33.67]I'll follow you follow you home
[03:37.95]I'll follow you follow you home
[03:42.88]
[03:45.45]This slope is treacherous
[03:49.87]I-I-I like it
data.trans:
[ti:Treacherous (Taylor’s Version)]
[ar:Taylor Swift]
[al:Red (Taylor's Version)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:06.07]//
[00:12.14]//
[00:18.21]将你的唇靠近我的唇
[00:21.70]维持着不碰触的距离
[00:25.55]
[00:26.89]模糊中互相凝视
[00:30.15]直到无法继续下去
[00:34.26]
[00:35.36]我愿意做你所说的一切
[00:38.89]如果你能用双手将我抱住
[00:42.65]
[00:44.09]我想我应该聪明地离开
[00:47.44]可你却让我深陷
[00:50.16]
[00:53.09]变化莫测的是你我的距离
[00:57.49]不顾一切是这曲折的前路
[01:01.81]变化莫测的是你我的距离
[01:06.01]然而我深爱着这一切
[01:10.43]
[01:14.64]即便这是选择题我也无法选择
[01:18.74]渐渐迷失了自我
[01:22.39]
[01:23.42]我听见心底的呐喊
[01:27.49]请求他不要离开
[01:31.12]
[01:32.36]我们的棱角所剩无几
[01:36.05]只为迎合这个世界
[01:39.43]
[01:40.77]随波逐流
[01:44.10]但你却令我停留
[01:46.79]
[01:49.80]变化莫测的是你我的距离
[01:54.14]不顾一切是这曲折的前路
[01:58.58]变化莫测的是你我的距离
[02:02.92]我深爱着这一切
[02:07.25]车灯的白光闪耀了整个不眠之夜
[02:11.37]我也会让你独自一人
[02:16.05]你的名字带着回声响彻了我的脑海
[02:20.22]我只是思考着你应该 你应该明白的
[02:24.69]即便危险重重 我也甘愿不顾一切
[02:28.83]所以我也应该跟随你 跟随你回到你的家去
[02:34.82]跟随你回到你的家去
[02:38.85]
[02:42.13]变化莫测的是心中闪烁的希望
[02:46.57]危险的是这不着边际的白日梦
[02:50.89]变化莫测的是心中闪烁的希望
[02:55.26]我 我 我 
[03:01.76]车灯的白光闪耀了整个不眠之夜
[03:05.99]我也会让你独自一人
[03:10.55]你的名字带着回声响彻了我的脑海
[03:14.66]我只是思考着你应该 你应该明白的
[03:19.26]即便危险重重 我也甘愿不顾一切
[03:23.41]所以我也应该跟随你 跟随你回到你的家去
[03:29.49]我该跟随你 跟随你回到你的家去
[03:33.67]跟随你回到你的家去
[03:37.95]跟随你回到你的家去
[03:42.88]
[03:45.45]变化莫测的是你我的距离
[03:49.87]我 我深爱着这一切
